lead_paragraph: The new requirements seek to help medical facilities better provide care during emergencies, including severe weather, pandemics and terrorist attacks.

headline.print_headline: Health Care Providers Scramble to Meet New Disaster Preparedness Rule
headline.main: Health Care Providers Scramble to Meet New Disaster Readiness Rule

snippet: The new requirements seek to help medical facilities better provide care during emergencies, including severe weather, pandemics and terrorist attacks....
abstract: Ruling from Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services gives 72,315 health care providers and suppliers just over year to meet new federal disaster preparedness requirements; many have raised concerns about their ability to make deadline, and about costs associated with meeting requirements.
